review: Dr. Sreya Bhattacharya Madam is a 'gift of GOD' to me. Her behaviour is a remidy for patients. She explain the treatment processes in a simple way which is easily understand by the patient.  I recommend to others that please consult with Dr. Sreya Bhattacharya for best treatment.

My experience with Sreya ma’am has been wonderful. She listened to all my problems very patiently and guided me accordingly. Always available over phone… A big big thumbs up to her.. the best part about her is that she will treat her patients with a smile on her face which makes one very comfortable around her..
Shreya Mam is very polite vry well behaved. She never gets irritated with any questions. Explains everything vry nice and always says truth. Always answers every question. Very nice doctor.
